children.text:
Concentrated Arnica Water, Organic Grape Seed Oil, Food Grade Bentonite Clay, Witch Hazel Leaf & Broccoli Sprout Water, Pure Zinc Oxide, Canadian Clay, Gluten Free Oat, Iron Oxides Ci77492 (Titanium Dioxide FREE. No Nano-Particles), Silica from Sand. Natural Preservation with MicroSilverBG (Powerful Healing Silver from Germany used to Treat Burn Victims). Aromas of Blue Lotus Flowers, Moringa, Honeysuckle & Ylang Ylang.Soothing Hydration Waters of AppleFruit, Passionfruit, Olive Leaf, Hibiscus Flower, Organic Wild Yam, Cucumber, Grapefruit & Watermelon Seed Extracts.Vegan Protein from Quinoa (Can Help to Strengthen & Repair Skin).
Healing Extracts of German Chamomile, Bixa Orellana Seed, Ginger, Vanilla, Cranberry, Linden Flower, Thyme, Rosemary, Rose & Basil.Pre & Post Probiotics with Microbiomes of Banana, Peppermint, Mango, Lavender, Licorice, Turmeric, Cinnamon, Chicory Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Celery Root/seed Extracts.

blurb.en: Our premium DePuff Eye and Face Mask product is perfect for not only looking younger by feeling younger.

children.text: Our premium DePuff Eye and Face Mask product is perfect for not only looking younger by feeling younger. Hand crafted with 100% organic ingredients natural for your skin. More than SPF, enjoy the cream for day and night protection. 24 hour cream, boosts moisture and enhances collagen repair.
